p: Antioxydant activities of CSAO oil were performed spectrophotometrically by measuring linoleic acid/Î²-carotene bleaching activity [ 42], 1,1-diphenyl-2-picryhydrazyl (DPPH) free radical scavenging activity [ 43] and ferric reducing power [ 44] as described previously. BHA was used as a reference standard. The angiotensin converting enzyme (ACE) inhibitory activity was carried out by measuring the hydrolysis rate of hippuryl-L-histidyl-L-leucine (Hip-His-Leu) as substrate using the spectrophotometric method [ 45]. IC 50 values denote the half maximal inhibitory sample concentration.
